name: Rise, My Friend
Lore: '''I sense you wish to continue your search for young Skywalker.''',
Text: 'If Emperor on Death Star II, take Vader into hand from a location you control (cards on him go to owner''s hand). OR During your control phase, if Vader escorting Luke or Leia at a site you control, relocate Vader (with captive) to Death Star II: Docking Bay. (Immune to Sense.)',
